Projects

Project 1

As part of my coursework in web development, I had the opportunity to create the Omnifood project, a fully responsive and visually appealing food delivery website. The project aimed to simulate a real-world food delivery service, offering a seamless user experience from browsing menu options to placing orders.

The Omnifood project allowed me to strengthen my skills in front-end development, back-end programming, and database management. It also emphasized the importance of user-centric design and effective project planning, as I had to prioritize features and deliver the project within a specified timeline.

Project 2

As part of my exploration into front-end development with React, I created Textutils, a web application designed to assist users in manipulating and analyzing text data. With its user-friendly interface and a range of powerful tools, Textutils aims to streamline text processing tasks.

Textutils offers an array of functionalities, including text case conversion (upper case, lower case), text length calculation, word count, character count (with and without spaces), and the ability to remove extra spaces. Users can conveniently apply these operations to their text with just a few clicks.

To enhance the user experience, I incorporated features like real-time updates, which instantly reflect changes made by the user, and a responsive layout that adapts to different screen sizes and devices. Additionally, I utilized modern CSS techniques and libraries to create an appealing and intuitive user interface.
